nodes.text: The Jedi Enclave was located on Haashimut, and run by Jedi Master Till'in during the beginning of the Cold War. The enclave was present on the planet since 24,000 BBY, and was used by the Jedi Order to keep a watchful eye on the Tion Cluster. The nearby caverns of the planet were used during generations for Jedi meditation and for the training of the Enclave's Padawans.
